attributes.action: award Mr.Ronnie Barker a posthumous Knighthood for services to comedy, and name him King of comedy.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Ronnie Barker was the greatest comedian this country has ever seen, and he should be recognised as such.

rejection.details: We are no longer accepting petitions calling for posthumous honours, as this is not possible under the honour rules. See www.honours.gov.uk/faqs.aspx
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
